name: class-employee-manager-long-practice
description: Now that you've learned about class syntax, commonJs modules, and reading test specs, it's time to bring these skills together! In this practice, you will: 1. Create and use JavaScript ES6 classes 2. Use inheritance to create a child of a parent class 3. Use polymorphism to overwrite/override an inherited method 4. Use commonJS modules to import/export your code
